formElement.label: Configuration Name:
formElement.documentation: Provide a unique name for the configuration, keeping in mind that you may need to create additional configurations over time.

formElement.label: Description:
formElement.documentation: You can supply a text description for your reference only. Commander does not use this information.

formElement.label: Login As:
formElement.documentation: The user name and password to use to connect to the specified Fortress URL.

formElement.label: URL:
formElement.documentation: The URL to use to connect to a Fortress server. For example: http://10.10.10.10:8080 or http://yourFortressserver

formElement.label: ProjectID:
formElement.documentation: A unique project for this configuration.

formElement.label: Server:
formElement.documentation: A unique server for this configuration.
